name: 摩尼遊戯TOKOYO
description: Maniyugi TOKOYO is a Pixel-art shooting game inspired by Japanese Buddhist worldview. The player becomes a priest, goes on a journey round the Rokudo, aims at constant life while accumulating merit.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 or later Processor: core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 6xx or later DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: on board
